name: Rhythm Housewife
description:
A 3-player cooperative music rhythm game. Play in a 3D space with every day objects such as tables, boxes or washing machine to create rhythms and compose a percussion-focused music piece. 

Controls Controller

   Joystick to move. Circle to interact.

The current version of game supports Sony DualShock 4 controllers. We are adding supports to more controllers.

Keyboard

   Player 1: "WASD" to move. "E" to interact.

   Player2: "IJKL" to move. "O" to interact.

   Player3: Arrow keys to move, Space to interact.

Made by

Runyu Zhong - Programming, UI Design

Shuyi Chang - Programming, Animation, Level Design

Yuxin Gao - Producer, Art, Audio

Gongzhu Li - Character Design, Animation, Level Design

Composer

Mark Benis Check out his beautiful songs and buy them here.
